title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Technical Analysis: BTC Rebounds From Recent Declines to Start the Weekend
description: Bitcoin started the weekend tracking around the $34,000 level, as prices rebounded following a two-day winless run. The cryptocurrency has begun to consolidate in recent days, following strong gains earlier in the week. Ethereum moved back closer to the $1,800 level. Bitcoin Bitcoin rose back above the $34,000 level on Saturday, which comes following recent […]

title: Crypto scammers exploit Mumbai doctor
description: Mumbai, India – In a distressing turn of events, a gynecologist from Mumbai has fallen victim to a cryptocurrency scam, resulting in a substantial loss of over $132,000. The incident sheds light on the dangers of online interactions and the importance of exercising caution when engaging in cryptocurrency investments. The ordeal began for the gynecologist ... title: Rippleâ€™s chief legal officer backs SEC commissioner in LBRY lawsuit dissent
description: Stuart Alderoty, the Chief Legal Officer of Ripple Labs, has expressed his support for United States Securities Exchange Commission (SEC) Commissioner Hester Peirce’s stance against perceived injustices in the LBRY lawsuit. In a recent statement, Alderoty thanked Commissioner Peirce and suggested the possibility of submitting an amicus brief to address ongoing injustices in non-fraud cases. ... Read more

title: Beyond the hype: Web3 is in dire need of a rebrand | Opinion
description: For web3 to reach its full potential and achieve widespread adoption, it's imperative that developers and designers prioritize UX.
